title: Airline refund confirmations and credit memos
dataVerified: Passenger name, original ticket, refund amount, credit memo number, airline
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake refund confirmations. Domain binding verifies airline. Accounting audit trail. Prevents double-refund fraud. Credit card chargeback documentation.
